      • PlayYearOfPlenty

        public Game PlayYearOfPlenty(Year_Of_Plenty_ request)
        makes a player play a YoP dev card
        Specified by:
        PlayYearOfPlenty in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        request - contains the information about who and what choices are involved.
        Returns:
        the game state
        pre
        The specified player has the dev card AND they didn't draw it this turn AND they haven't played any other dev cards this turn AND it is their turn AND the two chosen resources are different
        post
        The specifed player plays a YoP card and gets the resource cards of the two chosen types AND returns the game state immediately afterwards.

      • PlaySoldier

        public Game PlaySoldier(Soldier_ request)
        makes a player play a soldier card
        Specified by:
        PlaySoldier in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        request - contains the information about who and what choices are made
        Returns:
        the game state
        pre
        the specified player has the dev card AND they didn't draw it this turn AND they haven't played any other dev cards this turn AND it is their turn AND victim index != player index AND location didn't have the robber previously.
        post
        the specified player plays the card with the indicated choices AND returns the game state immediately after.

      • BuildRoad

        public Game BuildRoad(BuildRoad request)
        Causes a player to build a road
        Specified by:
        BuildRoad in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        request - contains information about building the road
        Returns:
        the game state
        pre
        the request is valid AND the indicated player has the requisite resources IF not free AND they have a road piece to place AND the chosen edge is valid for building AND it is their turn
        post
        The indicated play builds a road on the chosen spot AND lose the requisite resources IF not free AND returns the game state immediately after.

      • BuildSettlement

        public Game BuildSettlement(BuildSettlement request)
        Causes a player to build a settlement
        Specified by:
        BuildSettlement in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        request - contains information about building the settlement
        Returns:
        the game state
        pre
        the request is valid AND the indicated player has the requisite resources IF not free AND they have a settlement piece to place AND the chosen location is valid for building AND it is their turn
        post
        The indicated play builds a settlement on the chosen location AND lose the requisite resources IF not free AND returns the game state immediately after.

      • BuildCity

        public Game BuildCity(BuildCity request)
        Causes a player to build a city
        Specified by:
        BuildCity in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        request - contains information about building the city
        Returns:
        the game state
        pre
        the request is valid AND the indicated player has the requisite resources AND they have a city piece to place AND they have a settlement on the selected vertex AND it is their turn
        post
        The indicated play builds a city on the chosen vertex AND lose the requisite resources AND returns the settlement that was there to their supply AND returns the game state immediately after.

      • OfferTrade

        public Game OfferTrade(OfferTrade request)
        causes a player to offer a trade
        Specified by:
        OfferTrade in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        request - contains information about the trade offered
        Returns:
        the game state
        pre
        the indicated player has the cards they offer AND it is their turn AND the offer contains 1 or more cards AND the receiver isn't the sending player AND it is the sender's turn.
        post
        the trade offer is extended AND the game state immediately after is returned.

      • AcceptTrade

        public Game AcceptTrade(AcceptTrade request)
        causes a player to accept a trade
        Specified by:
        AcceptTrade in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        request - contains information about the acceptance
        Returns:
        the game state
        pre
        the indicated player was offered a trade AND it isn't their turn
        post
        the indicated player either accepts or rejects depending on willAccept AND the game state immediately after this is returned.

      • MaritimeTrade

        public Game MaritimeTrade(MaritimeTrade request)
        causes a player to make a maritime trade
        Specified by:
        MaritimeTrade in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        request - contains information about who and what choices are made.
        Returns:
        the game state
        pre
        the indicated player has a port for the appropriate trading ratio AND the have a sufficient number of input resource cards AND it is their turn.
        post
        the trade is performed AND returns the game state immediately afterward.

      • DiscardCards

        public Game DiscardCards(DiscardCards request)
        causes a player to discard cards
        Specified by:
        DiscardCards in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        request - contains information about who and which cards were discarded
        Returns:
        the game state
        pre
        the indicated player has >= 7 cards in their hand AND the cards to be discarded total in number half the players hand size rounded down AND all the discarded cards were cards the player had in their hand.
        post
        the player discards the cards AND the bank gains the discarded cards AND returns the game state immediately after this action.

        pre
